user.title: Connect to {integration_name}
user.description:
Enter your {integration_name} webhook provisioning key and secret. Find these in your {integration_name} integration setup under provisioning credentials.

More info: {docs_url}

data_description.provisioning_secret: Your secret associated with the provisioning key.

auth_and_claim.title: Claim device in {integration_name}
auth_and_claim.description:
This Home Assistant connection needs to be claimed in your {integration_name} portal before it can send data.

1. Go to: {claim_url}
2. Enter code: **{claim_code}**
3. (Code expires: {valid_until})

After successfully claiming the device in {integration_name}, select **Submit** below to continue.

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate {integration_name}
reauth_confirm.description:
Please re-enter your {integration_name} provisioning key and secret to restore the connection.

More info: {docs_url}

error.claim_failed_or_timed_out: Claiming the device failed or the code expired.

abort.reauth_successful: Reauthentication was successful! Your {integration_name} integration is now reconnected.

create_entry.add_sensor_mapping_hint: You can now add mappings from any sensor in Home Assistant to {integration_name} using the '+ add sensor mapping' button.

user.title: Add sensor mapping
user.description: Select a Home Assistant sensor to send to {integration_name}. The sensor name will be used as the {integration_name} metric key.

data_description.ha_entity_id: Select the sensor from Home Assistant to send to {integration_name}.

error.entity_already_mapped: This Home Assistant entity is already mapped.
error.entity_required: You must select a sensor entity.
